author: CNET
description:
Sony’s Afeela 1 electric sedan will be joined by the Prototype 2026 in 2028. The new electric SUV will share its sibling’s entertainment-focused dashboard tech and immersive custom themes. I was able to get my hands on both at CES.

Read more about Sony's Afeela 1 on CNET.com
Sony Debuts Afeela Prototype 2026 Electric SUV, Custom PlayStation Themes for Afeela 1 https://zdcs.link/9wBP8p

author: CNET
description:
